response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product not only represents a significant investment but also carries a profound personal significance. I understand that its true worth may be subjective and varies from person to person. Therefore, I am offering you the chance to own this item at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. I believe this offers a fair balance between the intrinsic value of the product and the potential benefits it could bring to you. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or arrange a viewing. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable piece with someone who appreciates its unique qualities.", "product_price": 1200000}
